title: Trump Speaks Out About Spyin' Hillary | Guest: Donald J. Trump | 2/15/22
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss Canada’s extreme actions against the Freedom Trucker Convoy, which are just the Great Reset under the guise of emergency powers. Former President Trump joins Glenn to discuss the bombshell confirmation that Hillary Clinton was spying on his 2016 presidential campaign. Sen. Mike Lee joins to discuss the bill he introduced regarding vaccine mandates. Justin Haskins, co-author of "The Great Reset," along with Rep. Michael Murphy, joins Glenn to discuss fighting ESG scores. Glenn has on Bob Barnes, a man who is bicycling across every state in America, who shares the kindness he’s experienced from everyday Americans. Stu shares his experience at Super Bowl LVI.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
